name: VR Fitness
description:
[Exercise with VR]
This application supports your daily exercise.

The instructors will support your exercise!
Exercise records are saved and can be checked!

The content includes sit-ups, push-ups, squats, and boxercise!

[Rich in customizable elements]

- Instructors: Customize your instructor to support your exercises!

- Modes: Time Attack, Count, Endless, and more!

- BGM, Background: Change the background music and background while exercising!


[Complete badges and hidden elements!]
Earn badges by completing missions!
You can also unlock hidden elements depending on your exercise progress!

Some of the hidden elements can be earned by solving riddles...?
